question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the fountain at the entrance of the community. Is the destination within sight at your current location? If yes, where is the destination in your view?  
choose:  
A. I see the fountain near the entrance of the community in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
B. I see the fountain near the entrance of the community in the lower right corner of my field of view.  
C. I do not see the fountain near the entrance of the residential area in my field of view.  
D. I see the fountain near the entrance of the community in the center of my field of view.  
E. I see the area near the fountain at the entrance of the community on the left side of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial frames show a view of a street with shops and parked vehicles, but there is no visible fountain near the entrance of the community in the field of view. The fountain only becomes visible much later in the sequence, indicating it is not within sight at the initial position.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 7)]
Option: C
Reason: From the initial frames (0-7 seconds), the view shows shops and parked vehicles. The fountain is not visible in the field of view at the initial position.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial frames show a view of a street with shops and parked vehicles, but there is no visible fountain near the entrance of the community in the field of view. The fountain only becomes visible much later in the sequence, indicating it is not within sight at the initial position.
